about_the_game:
The Original Soundtrack for "Glass Masquerade" is available for download as 320kbps MP3.

  • Features all background music tracks heard in the game.
  • Composed and produced by Nikita Sevalnev, known for his masterful work on soundtracks for the whole "Glass Masquerade" series.

Please note that this soundtrack is additional content and does not include the base game.
